MPC

Class Expr

  • java.lang.Object
    • MPC.ASTNode
      • MPC.Expr
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExprBinary, ExprBinding, ExprCall, ExprError, ExprId, ExprInt, ExprNil, ExprString, ExprUnary

    public abstract class Expr
extends ASTNode
    Representation for expressions in Pascal. An expression denotes a rule of computation that yields a value when the expression is evaluated. The value that is yielded depends upon the values of the constants, bindings, and variables in the expression and also upon the operators and functions that the expression invokes. (Pascal Report, page 165)
    Version:
    1.0

        Parameters:
        e1 - the Expr for the subscripted variable
        ee - a List with an Expr for each index experssion
